metadata.title: School of Information Technology - Tan Tao University
metadata.description: School of Information Technology - Tan Tao University trains high-quality human resources in Information Technology and Computer Science. Partnering with the 4.0 technology revolution.
metadata.keywords: School of Information Technology, Tan Tao University, SIT, Information Technology, Computer Science, Education, Training, Technology 4.0

messages: 2024-2025 Academic Year Admissions Now Open - Apply Now!
SIT students achieve high rankings in national programming competitions
Career opportunities at leading technology companies
Scientific research in AI and Machine Learning

hero.title: Partnering with
hero.subtitle: Tan Tao University's School of Information Technology leads in training high-quality human resources, breakthrough research, and applying advanced technology to practice.

stats.title: Our Achievements
stats.subtitle: With over 19 years of experience in education, TTU has achieved remarkable accomplishments

programs.title: Explore our
programs.subtitle: Tan Tao University's School of Information Technology applies the educational philosophy of "Liberal Arts - Lifelong Learning" with curricula based on Duke University, USA programs.

features.title: Educational Model
features.description: Applies the educational philosophy of "Liberal Arts - Lifelong Learning" with curricula based on Duke University, USA programs.

features.title: Faculty Team
features.description: Most faculty members hold PhD degrees from prestigious universities domestically and internationally with strong research profiles.

features.title: Research
features.description: 100% of students participate in research projects and can intern in the industry.

programs.title: Bachelor of Computer Science
programs.description: Develop programming skills and design modern software systems with focus on Data Engineering and Software Engineering
programs.features: Java, Python, C++, Web Development, Mobile Apps, Software Architecture, Data Engineering

programs.title: Bachelor of Artificial Intelligence
programs.description: Research and apply AI, Machine Learning with focus on Computer Vision and Natural Language Processing
programs.features: Machine Learning, Deep Learning, Computer Vision, Natural Language Processing, Neural Networks

programs.title: Bachelor of Data Science
programs.description: Analyze and extract data with focus on Bioinformatics and Business Analytics
programs.features: Data Analytics, Business Intelligence, Bioinformatics, Statistical Modeling, Big Data

programs.title: Master of Computer Science
programs.description: Graduate program specializing in advanced technology research and development
programs.features: Advanced Algorithms, Research Methods, Thesis Project, Industry Collaboration, Innovation
